meanings.definition: Occurring or done once a year.
meanings.sent1: The school's yearlies picnic is a fun event for all students.
meanings.sent2: I look forward to the yearlies family reunion every summer.
meanings.sent3: The yearlies dentist appointment always seems to sneak up on me.
meanings.sent4: The yearlies meteor shower is a breathtaking sight in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The yearlies holiday celebration brings joy to the whole neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A publication issued once a year.
meanings.sent1: The yearlies magazine features the best photos of the year.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the yearlies almanac to learn about annual events.
meanings.sent3: The yearlies journal is a great source of information for researchers.
meanings.sent4: The yearlies catalog showcases the latest products in the market.
meanings.sent5: The yearlies report provides a comprehensive overview of the industry trends.

meanings.sent1: The yearlies subscription fee for the magazine is quite affordable.
meanings.sent2: I need to budget for the yearlies insurance premium every year.
meanings.sent3: Paying the yearlies property tax is a yearly financial responsibility.
meanings.sent4: The yearlies membership dues support the club's activities.
meanings.sent5: Receiving the yearlies bonus at work is always a pleasant surprise.
